titles.title: National Beach Recreation Act
To ensure that recreation benefits are accorded the same weight as hurricane and storm damage reduction benefits and environmental restoration benefits.

bill.summary: 6/17/2003--Introduced. National Beach Recreation Act - Amends specified Federal law to direct the Secretary of the Army, in making recommendations to Congress for shore protection projects, to develop and implement procedures that treat recreational, hurricane and storm damage reduction, and environmental restoration benefits equally.
